ygData.subject: Re: what should i be looking for now?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... up. ... Question about the Journeyman s Boots.  Do they enhance your speed just by wearing them, or do you have to burn a SOW charge out of them to get a
ygData.messageBody:
--- Dan Leavy <dan@...> wrote:
> level 30 dwarf warrior
>
> PGT
> dragoon dirk
> SBH
> elm recurve bow => Ash or Oak as you like it set
up.
> +1 str earrings => Gold-Amber (+3 STR)
> collar of undead prot => Spiked Collar (+3 STR)
> blackened helm => Bronze Helm or B.Iron Crown
> grotesque mask
> BS mantle
> bronze tunic
> barbed arms => Bronze Arms
> bronze bracers => Bracers of Battle
> lizardscale cloak => Bronze Cloak
> bronze pants
> blackened boots => Bronze or Dwarven Work Boots
> +5 agi rings
> jboots => Or just wear these all the time.

Question about the Journeyman's Boots. Do they
enhance your speed just by wearing them, or do you
have to burn a SOW charge out of them to get a speed
increase?

Go all bronze on your character and start working on
Rubicite or Mithril/Silvered Plate. Any items you're
wearing that are chain equalivalent are holding you
back; plate is a requirement to do really, really well
at higher levels in melee.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
